items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their workout activities and progress with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: Users can post completed workouts to a social feed.
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities.
non_functional: Feed updates should load within 2 seconds.
Privacy settings must comply with GDPR.

items.title: Friends and Followers System
items.description: Allow users to connect with others by adding friends or following profiles.
acceptance_criteria: Users can search for other users by name or username.
Users can send and accept friend requests or follow/unfollow profiles.
non_functional: Search results should return within 1 second for up to 10,000 users.

notes: The requirement is broad; assumptions made include that social features will include activity sharing and friend/follower functionality. Further clarification needed on gamification, leaderboards, and integration with external social media.
